headline: Today's AI boom is 'very different' from the 90s dot-com bubble
summary: BMO Private Wealth chief market strategist, Carol Schleif, joins Morning Brief with Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Allie Canal to discuss whether markets (^DJI, ^GSPC, ^IXIC) are seeing an artificial intelligence (AI) bubble and to share her thoughts on Big Tech companies funding their AI projects with debt. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: Why MP Materials (MP) Is Down 7.1% After Wider Q3 Losses and Profitability Guidance Shift
summary: MP Materials reported third-quarter 2025 financial results, revealing sales of US$53.55 million and a net loss of US$41.78 million, with rare earth oxide (REO) production slightly lower year-over-year but higher neodymium-praseodymium (NdPr) output. Despite wider quarterly losses, company management announced an expectation to return to profitability in the fourth quarter of 2025 and beyond, signaling an important shift in their outlook. We will examine how management's...
